# DetectBarcodesRequest

**Structure**

A request that detects barcodes in an image.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DetectBarcodesRequest
```

## Overview

This request generates a collection of [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/BarcodeObservation] objects that describe each barcode the request detects.

## Creating a request

- **init(_:)**: Creates a barcode-detection request.

## Getting the revision

- **revision**: The algorithm or implementation the request uses.
- **supportedRevisions**: The collection of revisions the request supports.
- **DetectBarcodesRequest.Revision**: A type that describes the algorithm or implementation that the request performs.

## Inspecting a request

- **symbologies**: The barcode symbologies that the request detects in an image.
- **supportedSymbologies**: The collection of barcode symbologies that the request can recognize.
- **BarcodeSymbology**: The barcode symbologies that the framework detects.
- **coalescesCompositeSymbologies**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request coalesces multiple codes into one.

## Performing a request

- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on an image URL and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on image data and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Graphics image and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a pixel buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Media buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Image image and produces observations.
- **BarcodeObservation**: An object that represents barcode information that an image-analysis request detects.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- ImageProcessingRequest
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- VisionRequest
